localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: The Koan Free tier is a great first step in the journey, making it easy for teams to discover a more transparent, collaborative way of working. Teams in the habit of sharing status, recognizing wins, and heading off concerns early will naturally raise the bar for everyone else around them.
blogPost.body: The Koan Free tier is a great first step in the journey, making it easy for teams to discover a more transparent, collaborative way of working. Teams in the habit of sharing status, recognizing wins, and heading off concerns early will naturally raise the bar for everyone else around them.
blogPost.title: Koan Free Tier - Work with purpose using our OKR and status tracking platform
blogPost.author: Matt Tucker

localize.description: Koan免费层是这个旅程中的第一步，让团队很容易发现一种更透明、更协作的工作方式。习惯于分享状态、认可胜利和尽早解决疑虑的团队，自然会提高周围其他人的标准。
localize.tagline: 使用我们的OKR和状态跟踪平台，有目的的工作。

localize.description: Koan免費層是這個旅程中的第一步，讓團隊很容易發現一種更透明、更協作的工作方式。習慣於分享狀態、認可勝利和儘早解決疑慮的團隊，自然會提高周圍其他人的標準。
localize.tagline: 使用我們的OKR和狀態跟蹤平臺，有目的的工作。

previous.excerpt: Founders Club is a cooperative and chaotic teambuilding game for 2-8 players. It challenges your team to complete simultaneous actions under time pressure. Just like when founding a startup, you'll be scrambling not to run out of time and money.
previous.title: Founders Club by Atium - Does your team have what it takes to build a unicorn 🦄

localize.description: 创始人俱乐部》是一款适合2-8名玩家的合作和混乱的团队建设游戏。它挑战你的团队在时间压力下同时完成行动。就像创办创业公司时一样，你要争分夺秒，不能让时间和金钱耗尽。
localize.tagline: 你的团队是否具备打造独角兽的能力🦄。

localize.description: 創始人俱樂部》是一款適合2-8名玩家的合作和混亂的團隊建設遊戲。它挑戰你的團隊在時間壓力下同時完成行動。就像創辦創業公司時一樣，你要爭分奪秒，不能讓時間和金錢耗盡。
localize.tagline: 你的團隊是否具備打造獨角獸的能力🦄。

next.excerpt: We use software that scrapes the Internet to figure out which stocks are being mentioned more often. We filter through the noise and dig deep into 2-3 stocks. A weekly report is delivered straight to your inbox every Wednesday 9am sharp (PST).
next.title: Ticker Nerd - Analysing hot stocks before the hype train arrives

localize.description: 我们用软件在互联网上搜刮，找出哪些股票被提及的频率较高。我们从噪音中过滤出来，深入挖掘2-3只股票。每周三上午9点整（太平洋标准时间），我们会将周报直接发送到您的收件箱。
localize.tagline: 在炒作列车到来前分析热点股

localize.description: 我們用軟件在互聯網上搜刮，找出哪些股票被提及的頻率較高。我們從噪音中過濾出來，深入挖掘2-3只股票。每週三上午9點整（太平洋標準時間），我們會將週報直接發送到您的收件箱。
localize.tagline: 在炒作列車到來前分析熱點股
